App.description: GloRe is an open network that aims to enlarge its audience both of volunteers and NGOs all over the world to make certificates available to everybody.

Auth.loginSubtitle: Enter an email or username to login to your account
Auth.networkError: A network error occurred, please try again
Auth.passwordResetMessage: You will receive soon an email with a link to reset your password.
Auth.passwordResetSubtitle: Enter your email or username to receive a password reset link
Auth.signupDialogMessage:
Currently, you can sign up to GloRe only with an invitation from your organization.

If your organization is part of the GloRe network and you want to get access as a volunteer, tutor or coordinator, ask a representative to send you an invitation.

For more information, please visit our website.
Auth.signupMessage: Don't have an account? <link>Sign up now</link>

Certificates.description: GloRe offers a wide range of learning modules to help you develop your soft skills and knowledge. Each module is designed to be interactive and engaging, providing you with the tools you need to succeed in your personal and professional life. After completing at least 3 modules, you will be able to request a certificate of completion.
Certificates.notFoundMessage: The certificate you are looking for does not exist or has been moved
Certificates.title: Certificates

Common.errorMessage: Please try again or <contactUs>contact us</contactUs> if the problem persists
Common.notFoundMessage: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved
Common.syncErrorMessage: A synchronization error occurred, please refresh the page
Common.updatedMonthsAgo: Updated {count, plural, =1 {last month} other {# months ago}}
Common.updatedYearsAgo: Updated {count, plural, =1 {one year} other {# years ago}}

Modules.completeStepsToProceed: Complete all previous steps to proceed
Modules.correctAnswerMessage: Great job, you've understood this concept correctly.
Modules.description: GloRe offers a wide range of learning modules to help you develop your soft skills and knowledge. Each module is designed to be interactive and engaging, providing you with the tools you need to succeed in your personal and professional life. After completing at least 3 modules, you will be able to request a certificate of completion.
Modules.notFoundMessage: The module you are looking for does not exist or has been moved
Modules.questionsSubtitle: Reply with true or false to the following {count, plural, =1 {statement} other {statements}} and test your knowledge.
Modules.replyToProceed: Complete {type, select, questions {the quiz} skill_evaluation {the evaluation} subskill_evaluations {all evaluations} other {}} to proceed
Modules.skillEvaluationSubtitle: How would you rate your general skills in this area?
Modules.stepType: {type, select, descriptive {Reading} questions {Quiz} skill_evaluation {Self-assessment} subskill_evaluations {Self-assessment} other {Step}}
Modules.subskillEvaluationsSubtitle: Give a score from 1 to 5 to {count, plural, =1 {the following statement} other {each of the following statements}}.
Modules.title: Learning modules
Modules.wrongAnswerMessage: Don't worry, you can always review the material again.
Modules.reviewModeMessage: In review mode you can interact with all the steps of the module, but your replies can't be changed
Modules.completedTitle: Congratulations, you've completed {count, plural, =1 {your first} =2 {your second} =3 {your third} other {another}} module!
Modules.completedTitleAll: Congratulations, you've completed all the modules!
Modules.completedMessage: Review the steps or go back to all modules to continue your learning.
Modules.completedRequestCertificate: You can now request a certificate to verify your skills!
Modules.completeIncludeInCertificate: You can now include this module in your certificate!
